name: Problem?
description: In Problem, you will play as a virus where your goal is to infiltrate the internet by getting passed antivirus and firewalls. It is what is to be considered a traditional platformer in the sense that you are playing in a 2D environment with platforms and obstacles you will have to navigate through in order to get to the next area. At certain states in the game, the player will find themselves up against a firewall, which is to be considered the real challenge of the game where the player will have to have incredibly quick reaction times as well as manage uptime on shooting the firewall in order to breakthrough and get to the destination.
